) column:  The “Alert” column presents thresholds for abnormal 
labour observations that require further assessment and action by the health-care provider, 
as summarized in Tables 3–7. If labour observations do not meet any of the criteria in the 
“Alert” column, labour progression and care should be regarded as normal, and no medical 
intervention is warranted.
